title: Inception
description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as The Joker emerges, Batman must confront him.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Jurassic Park
description: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: Inglourious Basterds
description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: The Social Network
description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

title: The Revenant
description: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

title: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption, and the federal government.

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: Game of Thrones
description: Noble families vie for control of the mythical land of Westeros in this epic fantasy series.

title: The Mandalorian
description: A lone bounty hunter explores the outer reaches of the galaxy far from the authority of the New Republic.

title: Black Mirror
description: Anthology series exploring the dark and often dystopian sides of technological advancements.

title: The Crown
description: Follows the reign of Queen Elizabeth II and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

title: Westworld
description: In a futuristic amusement park, visitors experience the Wild West with android hosts who become self-aware.

title: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids in a small town uncover supernatural mysteries and government conspiracies.

title: The Office
description: A mockumentary-style sitcom following the daily lives of office employees at Dunder Mifflin Paper Company.

title: Sherlock
description: Modern adaptation of Arthur Conan Doyle's detective stories featuring Benedict Cumberbatch as Sherlock Holmes.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer navigates the dangerous criminal underworld.

title: Friends
description: Follows the lives of six friends living in New York City as they navigate love, career, and friendship.

title: The Big Bang Theory
description: A group of socially awkward scientists and their interactions with each other and the world.

title: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind recruits eight individuals with unique skills to carry out an ambitious plan: to rob the Royal Mint of Spain.

title: The Simpsons
description: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.
